A

askBinary(int) - Static method in class ui.NumeralSystems
This method takes care of asking for the digits one by one if our choice was binary and makes sure that we wrote something correct, using the validation method for this.

This method takes care of asking for the digits one by one if our choice was decimal and makes sure that we wrote something correct, using the validation method for this.

This method takes care of asking for the digits one by one if our choice was hexadecimal and makes sure that we wrote something correct, using the validation method for this.
